thread.title: Partno Kevin.
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Partno Kevin.

author: Partno Kevin.
title: Partno Kevin.
text:
100% Perfect advice over the phone, nothing was too much trouble.
Excellent service with parts being delivered next day.
Clear & concise videos on YouTube.
I wish all companies would be as excellent as The Shower Doctor.
I will 100% be using these guys again & recommending them to all friends & family.
